```{python echo=FALSE}
#| label: plotnine-demo
#| fig-cap: "A plotnine example"
#| fig-width: 2
#| fig-height: 2
#| echo: false
from IPython.display import display
# set backend early if headless (optional)
import matplotlib
matplotlib.use("Agg")

from plotnine import ggplot, aes, geom_point, theme_minimal
import pandas as pd

df = pd.DataFrame({"x":[1,2,3,4], "y":[3,1,4,2]})
p = (ggplot(df, aes("x","y")) + geom_point(size=4) + theme_minimal())

# important: print the plot object so Quarto captures it
display(p)
```
